summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102386 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
